product_name: Sawyer Manta Double Bend Canoe Paddle
long_description: Glide through the water with a minimum of effort with the beautifully constructed Sawyer Manta Double Bend canoe paddle. Shaft and blade are made of laminated western red cedar and Douglas fir to create a beautiful lightweight, responsive paddle that delivers performance. Fiberglass reinforcements on the blade enhance durability. Double-bend shaft eases pressure on the lower wrist and enhances the efficiency of the blade in the water. Shaft is bent at 11deg at the throat. Tough material protects the blade tip from rocks and rough treatment and wraps along the entire blade edge. The Sawyer Manta Double Bend canoe paddle features a curled palm grip that fits naturally in your hands.
short_description: Glide through the water with a minimum of effort with the beautifully constructed Sawyer Manta Double Bend canoe paddle.
